Sara takes a swing



I think this is the one she knocked over the first baseman's arms for the two-RBI single that earned her player of the game.
Taken Saturday, May 08, 2004, 01:11:19pm.  Original image size: 2560x2048, 5.7Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/1250s @ F2.8, ISO 100, 70-200mm/F2.8 @ 200mm (320mm equiv)
PS7 CRW 5000:-10, 0.25:10:50:50:0:25:5+M, Crop, USM 10:20, Hue reds +5
